H0.text: Zebu cattle are famously distinguished by. Distinctive Horns

H1.text: Zebu cattle are famously distinguished by. Color Patterns

H2.text: Zebu cattle are famously distinguished by. Large Ears

H3.text: Zebu cattle are famously distinguished by. Hump

A4.text: Zebu, like many Sanga cattle, differ from taurine cattle in the fatty hump on their shoulders

A5.text: Zebu, as well as many Sanga cattle, have humps on the shoulders
